i.name: Blade's End
i.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

q.name: Noxian Diplomacy
q.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

w.name: Rake
w.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

e.name: Assassin's Path
e.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

r.name: Shadow Assault
r.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.

i1.blurb: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Talon's''' abilities ''wound'' enemy {{tip|champions}} and epic {{tip|monsters}} every time they deal damage, lasting 6 seconds and stacking up to 3 times.

'''Talon's''' next [[basic attack]] against enemies with 3 ''wounds'' consume them, causing them to bleed for {{as|{{pp|75 to 245}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} over 2 seconds, with each tick occurring every {{fd|0.125}} seconds.
i1.name: Blade's End

riot.name: Blade's End
riot.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

q1.blurb: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} ''Noxian Diplomacy'' has a different effect depending on the {{sti|range}} with target.
{{sbc|Standard - Outside 170 units:}} '''Talon''' {{tip|dashes}} onto his target, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
{{sbc|Melee - Within 170 units:}} '''Talon''' skewers his target, causing ''Noxian Diplomacy'' to {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|50% {{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
If ''Noxian Diplomacy'' kills its target, '''Talon''' {{tip|heals}} for {{sti|health|{{pp|20 to 71|color=health}}}} and 50% of its {{sti|cooldown}} is refunded.
The melee version of ''Noxian Diplomacy'' resets '''Talon's''' autoattack timer.
q1.name: Noxian Diplomacy

riot.name: Noxian Diplomacy
riot.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
riot.tooltip:
Talon leaps to target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If cast from melee range, Talon does not leap but instead critically strikes, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

When Noxian Diplomacy kills a unit, Talon regains {{ f4 }} health and refunds {{ e5 }}% of its cooldown.

w1.blurb: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' sends out a volley of daggers, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies they pass through.
The daggers linger for {{fd|0.75}} seconds before flying back to '''Talon''', dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies they pass through and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second.
leveling:
{{st|Return Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 130}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|50+70 to 110+130}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
w1.name: Rake
notes: * If ''Talon'' dies while ''Rake'' is mid-air the projectiles will still complete their travel.

riot.name: Rake
riot.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
riot.tooltip:
Talon tosses a volley of blades, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to units hit and returning to him after a delay.

On their way back to Talon, the blades deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional damage and slow the enemy by {{ e2 }}% for 1 second.

e1.blurb: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
e1.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|Used terrain is affected by cooldown reduction}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' {{tip|dashes}} a maximum of 800 units over the target structure or piece of terrain, with the dash's speed based on his own {{sti|ms|{{as|movement speed}}}}.
'''Talon''' cannot cast ''Assassin's Path'' on the same area of terrain for a set duration.
e1.name: Assassin's Path

riot.name: Assassin's Path
riot.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
riot.tooltip:
Talon vaults up to {{ f2 }} units over the nearest structure or terrain in the target direction. The vault's speed is affected by Talon's movement speed.

Talon cannot dash over the same section of terrain more than once every {{ f3 }} seconds.

r1.blurb: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' disperses a ring of blades, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit, while gaining {{tip|invisibility}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

When '''Talon''' emerges from {{tip|invisibility}}, the blades converge to his location, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies they pass through. Breaking {{tip|invisibility}} with a basic attack or {{ai|Noxian Diplomacy|Talon}} causes the blades to converge to his target instead.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|90 to 180 3}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|90*2 to 180*2 3}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|40|55|70}}%}}
r1.name: Shadow Assault
notes: * Stealth is not removed if ''Talon'' uses an item or summoner spell without an associated animation.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single pass.

riot.name: Shadow Assault
riot.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
riot.tooltip:
Talon disperses a ring of blades that deal {{ damage }} physical damage to all units they hit, gains {{ movespeed*100 }}% increased movement speed, and becomes Invisible for up to {{ duration }} seconds. When the Invisibility ends, the blades converge, dealing the same damage again to enemies they pass through.

If Talon cancels Invisibility with an attack or Noxian Diplomacy, the blades converge on his target's location instead.

Stealth - Invisible: Talon can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
